summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to TransUnion, demanding financial account information and credit reports for two individuals (names redacted) as part of a criminal investigation into suspected felonies. The document includes instructions for compliance and a request for confidentiality.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued and signed the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Referred to as the signatory on the subpoena and the point of contact for the investigation; name is redacted.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance Date
events.description: TransUnion's custodian of records is commanded to appear before the grand jury at the U.S. Courthouse in New York to testify and produce requested financial records.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The grand jury subpoena is issued to TransUnion, demanding financial account information for two individuals as part of a criminal investigation.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Manhattan, New York, NY
TransUnion, 555 W. Adams Street, Chicago, IL 60661
The Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A federal grand jury subpoena was issued to TransUnion on August 30, 2019, demanding financial account information and credit reports for two specific individuals.
The investigation involves alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 1791 and 201, which relate to providing or accepting bribes to public officials and witnesses.
The U.S. Attorney's Office requested that TransUnion keep the subpoena confidential to preserve the investigation's integrity and prevent interference.
The subpoena allows TransUnion to avoid a personal appearance by producing the requested records with a custodian declaration by the return date of September 13, 2019.
The names of the two individuals whose financial information is sought are fully redacted in the document.
